reviews.review: This is one of, if not the best puzzle games ever made. It took what Portal did and made it 10x better. With funny characters, good puzzles, and amazing gameplay you will enjoy this game. Valve is by far one of the best corporations in the gaming industry.

The concept of living in the future and being able to shoot portals and fly through them is stunning. All you need to do is "find a gun that makes holes. Not bullet holes, but you know what I mean." - Wheatley

A Puzzle Game With Story. Some really confusing puzzles are in this game and it has a very good story and playing the first game before this is recommended and now I can talk about the co-op its amazing being able to see your partner's view

Can a puzzle game be the best game in the world ? Yea ! It's not a simple game, it's a masterpiece !

I like this one more than the first because it was much more complicated. It followed the story very well and the multiplayer is actually fun, I didn't think that it would be but it works. Portal is my favorite gaming puzzle series.

This extremely popular game currently has over 150,000 positive reviews on Steam and is frequently listed as one of the best games of all time, so this is little to say about it that hasn’t already been said. This game takes everything that its predecessor did right and improves on it in every way. The game is longer, the story is better, the graphics are improved, there are new mechanics, and on top of the single-player campaign, this game also has a co-op campaign which supports online and local multiplayer (which also has its own story). This game is absolutely fantastic, and you are doing yourself a disservice if you don’t give this game a try.
Это классика! В это играть надо!
its very fun! lots of puzzles and sportsmanship if u play co-op!
so epic better than the first game

Incredible aesthetics and very fun puzzles. And if you want a greater challenge, just play Mevious's tests, the custom levels hit incredibly high highs and you can make your own puzzles INCREDIBLY easily. The puzzles are INCREDIBLY intuitive for the concept they use and very satisfying mechanics sure to test your spatial reasoning. A true classic
one of the best games on here, fun and so  what hard game play, amazing story, and some of the best acting and really good lines
Had so much fun playing this on singleplayer and multiplayer, best game for mucking about and having a laugh. Can we get a portal 3 in the chat?
